description.english: Start a game
description.schinese: 游戏开始

description.english: Finish the tutorial adventure
description.schinese: 完成教学关卡

description.english: Conquer 1 territory
description.schinese: 征服1处领土

description.english: Conquer 5 territories
description.schinese: 征服5处领土

description.english: Conquer 10 territories
description.schinese: 征服10块领土

displayName.german: Dort drüben ist das Gras grüner
displayName.schinese: 邻家芳草绿,隔岸风景好

description.english: Unlock 1 sector of the kingdom map
description.french: Déverrouiller 1 secteur de la carte du royaume
description.italian: Sblocca 1 settore della mappa del regno
description.schinese: 在王国地图中解开1个区域
description.spanish: Desbloquea 1 sector del mapa del reino.

description.english: Unlock 4 sectors of the kingdom map
description.french: Déverrouiller 4 secteurs de la carte du royaume
description.italian: Sblocca 4 settori della mappa del regno
description.schinese: 解锁王国地图的4个区域
description.spanish: Desbloquea 4 sectores del mapa del reino.

description.english: Unlock all sectors of the kingdom map
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les secteurs de la carte du royaume
description.german: Schaltet alle Sektoren der Königreich-Karte frei.
description.italian: Sblocca ogni settore della mappa del regno
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie włości na mapie królestwa
description.russian: Разблокируйте все секторы на карте королевства.
description.schinese: 解锁王国地图全部区域
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los sectores del mapa del reino.

description.english: Conquer 1 enemy territory
description.schinese: 征服1处敌方领土

description.english: Conquer 5 enemy territories
description.schinese: 征服5处敌方领土

description.english: Conquer 10 enemy territories
description.schinese: 征服10块敌方领土

displayName.french: À leur nez et à leur barbe

description.english: Conquer 1 territory belonging to the Frostbeards
description.schinese: 征服霜胡势力的1处领土

description.english: Conquer 3 territories belonging to the Frostbeards
description.schinese: 征服霜胡势力的3处领土

description.english: Conquer 1 territory belonging to the Dune Tribe
description.french: Conquérir 1 territoire de la tribu des Dunes
description.italian: Strappa 1 territorio alla Tribù delle dune
description.schinese: 征服沙丘势力的1处领土
description.spanish: Conquista 1 territorio de la Tribu de las Dunas.

displayName.english: Is it Hot In Here, Or Is It Just Me?
displayName.german: Ist es heiß hier – oder liegt das an mir?
displayName.polish: Czy tu jest gorąco czy tylko mi się zdaje?
displayName.schinese: 是我错觉还是真的有点热？

description.english: Conquer 3 territories belonging to the Dune Tribe
description.french: Conquérir 3 territoires de la tribu des Dunes
description.italian: Strappa 3 territori alla Tribù delle dune
description.schinese: 征服沙丘势力的3处领土
description.spanish: Conquista 3 territorios de la Tribu de las Dunas.

description.english: Conquer 1 territory belonging to the Broken Crown
description.french: Conquérir 1 territoire de la Couronne brisée

description.schinese: 征服碎冠势力的1处领土
description.spanish: Conquista 1 territorio de la Corona Rota.

displayName.italian: Ti si è scheggiata la lama

description.english: Conquer 3 territories belonging to the Broken Crown
description.french: Conquérir 3 territoires de la Couronne brisée

description.schinese: 征服碎冠势力的3处领土
description.spanish: Conquista 3 territorios de la Corona Rota.

description.schinese: 征服邪教势力的3处领土

description.spanish: Rechaza 1 ataque enemigo en un escenario de defensa.

description.spanish: Rechaza 5 ataques enemigos en un escenario de defensa.

description.spanish: Rechaza 10 ataques enemigos en un escenario de defensa.

description.schinese: 击败霜胡势力

displayName.french: Et Dune, et deux, et trois zéro

description.schinese: 击败沙丘势力
description.spanish: Derrota a la Tribu de las Dunas.

description.english: Defeat the Broken Crown
description.schinese: 打败碎冠势力

description.schinese: 打败邪教势力

description.english: Conquer all map territories
description.french: Conquérir tous les territoires de la carte
description.italian: Conquista tutti i territori della mappa
description.schinese: 征服所有地图的领土
description.spanish: Conquista todos los territorios del mapa.

description.english: Win the game in under 40 turns
description.french: Gagner la partie en moins de 40 tours
description.german: Gewinnt das Spiel in unter 40 Runden.
description.italian: Termina una partita in meno di 40 turni
description.russian: Закончите игру менее чем за 40 ходов.
description.schinese: 在40回合以内赢得胜利
description.spanish: Pásate el juego en menos de 40 turnos.

description.english: Win the game without losing a territory
description.french: Gagner la partie sans perdre de territoire
description.german: Gewinnt das Spiel, ohne ein Territorium zu verlieren.
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza perdere alcun territorio
description.polish: Zakończ grę zwycięstwem, nie tracąc ani jednej włości
description.russian: Закончите игру, не дав врагу захватить свою территорию.
description.schinese: 在未失去任何领土的情况下赢得胜利
description.spanish: Pásate el juego sin perder ningún territorio.

displayName.english: Losing… I Wonder How It Feels…
displayName.german: Wenn's beim ersten Versuch nicht klappt, sagt mir, wie es sich anfühlt
displayName.schinese: 一开始就败了？那不是爽死了？

description.english: Win the game without losing a single adventure
description.french: Gagner la partie sans perdre d'aventure
description.german: Gewinnt das Spiel, ohne ein Abenteuer zu verlieren.
description.italian: Termina il gioco senza perdere alcuna avventura
description.polish: Zakończ grę zwycięstwem bez porażki w żadnej przygodzie
description.russian: Закончите игру, не проиграв ни в одном приключении.
description.schinese: 在不输掉任何冒险的情况下赢得胜利
description.spanish: Pásate el juego sin perder en ninguna aventura.

displayName.russian: Кто не рискует, тот не побеждает!

description.french: Gagner la partie en mode Ironman

description.schinese: 在铁人模式中赢得胜利
description.spanish: Pásate el juego en modo Hombre de hierro.

description.schinese: 在征服所有领土的情况下赢得铁人模式
description.spanish: Pásate el juego en modo Hombre de hierro con todos los territorios.

description.english: Beat the game in Ironman Mode without losing a single adventure
description.french: Gagner la partie en mode Ironman sans perdre d'aventure

description.english: Win the game without any Champion dying
description.french: Gagner la partie sans perdre le moindre champion
description.german: Gewinnt das Spiel, ohne dass ein Champion stirbt.

description.polish: Zakończ grę zwycięstwem bez utraty żadnego z bohaterów

description.spanish: Pásate el juego sin que muera ningún Campeón.
